author: Special Correspondent
title: Congress questions setting up of PM CARES Fund to deal with cornonavirus
description: Why this new fund when the Prime Minister’s National Relief Fund is already in existence: party leaders
content:
Congress leaders on Monday questioned the setting up of PM CARES Fund to deal with the cornonavirus pandemic by Prime Minister Narendra Modi when the Prime Ministers National Relief Fund (PMNRF) is already in existence.
